comments.comments_text: The resulting corner from Dries Mertens (Napoli) only finds one of the defenders, who heads it out of danger.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The resulting corner from [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) only finds one of the defenders, who heads it out of danger.

comments.comments_text: The defence had a hard time blocking out the strike from Dries Mertens (Napoli). He didn't hesitate and finished from outside the box right after he had received a pass from his teammate.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The defence had a hard time blocking out the strike from [PLAYER] ([TEAM]). He didn't hesitate and finished from outside the box right after he had received a pass from his teammate.

comments.comments_text: Hee-Chan Hwang (Salzburg) works the corner short.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) works the corner short.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Dries Mertens (Napoli) beautifully controls a strongly hit pass from Jose Callejon inside the box. He cuts inside his marker and rifles the ball into the roof of the net. 0:1.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Goal! [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) beautifully controls a strongly hit pass from [PLAYER] inside the box. He cuts inside his marker and rifles the ball into the roof of the net. 0:1.

comments.comments_text: Zlatko Junuzovic (Salzburg) swings in the corner, but fails to find any of his teammates. One of the defenders reacts superbly to get it clear.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) swings in the corner, but fails to find any of his teammates. One of the defenders reacts superbly to get it clear.

comments.comments_text: Andreas Ulmer (Salzburg) takes the corner kick and sends the ball among a huddle of players inside the penalty area, but one of the defenders clears it to safety.

comments.comments_text: The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Cican Stankovic trots off the pitch and is replaced by Carlos (Salzburg).

comments.comments_text: Andreas Ulmer (Salzburg) goes over to take the corner kick and it looks like he will swing the ball into the penalty box.

comments.comments_text: Zlatko Junuzovic (Salzburg) takes the corner but only sends it into a huddle of the defenders and one of them makes a good clearance.

comments.comments_text: The resulting corner from Zlatko Junuzovic (Salzburg) is cleared by the opposition's defence.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The resulting corner from [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) is cleared by the opposition's defence.

comments.comments_text: Hirving Lozano (Napoli) can't expect anything else than a yellow card for his hard tackle. And a yellow it is. Clement Turpin didn't think twice about pulling it out of his pocket.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) can't expect anything else than a yellow card for his hard tackle. And a yellow it is. [REFEREE] didn't think twice about pulling it out of his pocket.

comments.comments_text: Today's referee Clement Turpin rightly decides to book Kevin Malcuit (Napoli) for his harsh tackle.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Today's referee [REFEREE] rightly decides to book [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) for his harsh tackle.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Erling Haaland (Salzburg) wins the battle of wills and sends an unstoppable penalty past Alex Meret into the bottom right corner.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Goal! [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) wins the battle of wills and sends an unstoppable penalty past [PLAYER] into the bottom right corner.

comments.comments_text: The foul by Erling Braut Haaland (Salzburg) is worthy of a card and a yellow is duly shown by Clement Turpin.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The foul by Erling Braut [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) is worthy of a card and a yellow is duly shown by [REFEREE].

comments.comments_text: It looks like Hee-Chan Hwang (Salzburg) saw red with that tackle. Clement Turpin won't tolerate such behaviour on the pitch and blows for a foul.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: It looks like [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) saw red with that tackle. [REFEREE] won't tolerate such behaviour on the pitch and blows for a foul.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Kevin Malcuit plays a pass to the feet of Dries Mertens (Napoli), and he shoots inside the left post from inside the box. It's 1:2.

comments.comments_text: It's a goal! Erling Haaland (Salzburg) bursts into the box to get on the end of a whipped in cross from Zlatko Junuzovic and scores magnificently from close range into the right side of the goal. 2:2.

comments.comments_text: Zlatko Junuzovic (Salzburg) steps up to take the corner. He launches the ball into the penalty area, but it only finds the head of an opposing player who clears the danger.
